Viewing the Tools Menu

The Tools menu displays with all components, although certain options are not enabled for specific components. The options on the Tools menu include:

Personal Options

Set personal options for your workspace, StarTeamMPX, and the File, Change Request, Requirement, Task, and Topic components. Each of these items has a tab that presents a variety of choices. See the Setting Personal Options section of the Help system for additional details.

Server Administration

Review your account on the server. If you have administrative privileges, you can also select options for Connection Administration, Server Administration, and Server Security. See the Administering the Server section of the Help system for additional details.

StarTeam Log

Display the latest information from the client log, primarily for diagnostic purposes. The log can display error messages that occur during use of the application, summaries of each operation performed, details about each operation performed, and StarTeamMPX events.

Convert to Native Format

Convert files in PVCS and Microsoft Visual SourceSafe projects to files that can be stored in the application.
